title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Art Design Pedagogy with VR-Based Serious Games

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary art theory and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and implement visual elements of the Rococo art style using VR-based serious games.
Learners can propose immersive art education design plans utilizing digital interactive technologies.
Learners can evaluate strengths and areas for improvement in educational scenarios through peer assessment and expert feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
